critique: The document expresses strong condemnation of the PRC's role in the opioid crisis and a determination to take action. It conveys a sense of urgency and resolve. It expresses sadness and disgust at the loss of life and the destruction of communities caused by synthetic opioids. There is also an element of surprise at the PRC's unwillingness to address the issue despite having the capacity to do so. The document does not express joy or fear.
